data.description: Our Business Overdraft Facility can give you flexible access to additional cash flow.
data.name: Business Overdraft - Residential Security

fees.name: Loan Finalisation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: per security document when you pay out the facility

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: At the end of each calendar month during which you are in default for any time, in respect of each breach of the agreement or other event as a result of which you are in default

fees.name: Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: when you ask Heritage for its approval under the agreement

fees.name: Redraw Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Once your facility is fully drawn and approval to redraw is given. Not applicable to online redraw

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per Consent if required to Consent to the registration of a Land Titles document over the security property to a third party

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If Heritage is required to produce a security document to the State's Land Titles Authority or agency

fees.name: Partial Release Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200.00 per security

fees.name: Redocumentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you apply to change the specific details of your facility or substitute securities

fees.name: Audit Certificate Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per certificate

fees.name: Heritage Online Business Internet Banking Security Token Fee
fees.additionalValue: per token, every 3 years. Includes replacement tokens

fees.name: Heritage Online Business Internet Banking Account Reconciliation
fees.additionalInfo: $0.05 plus GST per entry.

fees.name: Heritage Online Business Internet Banking Payroll and Creditor Batch Payments
fees.additionalInfo: $0.05 plus GST per payment in a batch

fees.name: Cash and Coin Handling Fee (Withdrawals)
fees.additionalInfo: If a cash withdrawal of over $2,000 is made from your facility account.  $1.00 per $1,000 or part of $1,000 exceeding $2,000.

fees.name: Cash and Coin Handling Fee (Deposits)
fees.additionalInfo: If a cash deposit is made to your facility account at a Heritage branch or mini-branch of coins which have not been correctly bagged and counted.  2% of value.

fees.name: Overseas Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a cheque in foreign currency is deposited to your facility account (note: Heritage does not always accept these deposits).

fees.name: Document/Record Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For record searches, traces, supplying copy of details of transactions (including Visa card transaction slips) on your facility account (refunded if fee was charged for transaction-specific information and the transaction was incorrectly debited).

fees.name: Heritage Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each cheque drawn by Heritage on itself which is issued from your facility account.  $10.00 per cheque (including replacement cheques).

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a telegraphic transfer is made from your facility account via RTGS within Australia

fees.name: RTGS Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a payment/transfer to your facility account via RTGS occurs

fees.name: Transaction Listing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a transaction listing between two given dates is issued on your facility account.  $5.00 per page.

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the second and each subsequent statement issued during a month, or when a statement is issued on your facility account at your request at any time before the next statement issuing date:  $1.00 per statement

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a direct debit authorised to be made from or to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: SMS Alerts
fees.additionalInfo: $0.25 for each SMS Alert delivered by SMS to your mobile phone.

fees.name: Non-Heritage Counter Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each withdrawal transaction on your facility account at a financial institution (other than Heritage) in Australia.

fees.name: Overseas Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each overseas transaction on your facility account at an ATM or financial institution outside Australia.  $5.00 (plus Overseas Currency Conversion Fee).

fees.name: Overseas Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a Visa purchase or withdrawal transaction on your facility account is made in a foreign currency.  3% of the Australian dollar amount of the transaction.

fees.name: Overdraft Reference Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per day on the date of any debit, other than for fees and charges or interest, to your facility account which causes an overdrawing or further overdrawing.

fees.name: Card Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the second and each subsequent replacement card in a year.

fees.name: Emergency Card Replacement Fee (Australia)
fees.additionalInfo: If an emergency replacement card is requested for delivery within Australian within 5 days.

fees.name: Emergency Card Replacement Fee (Overseas)
fees.additionalInfo: If an emergency replacement card is requested for delivery outside Australian within 5 days

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a cheque drawn on your facility account is dishonoured

fees.name: Cheque Stop Payment Request Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request Heritage to stop payment on a cheque drawn on your facility account.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a direct debit due to be made from your facility account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Periodical Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Free (payment to Heritage account); or $3.00 for a periodical payment to another financial institution

fees.name: Sweep Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever you place a sweep on your facility account to allow funds to be drawn from it and transferred to another Heritage account to meet drawings on that other account.  $2.00 per sweep.

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever Heritage manually transfers funds from your facility account.  $2.50 (transfer to Heritage account); $4.00 (transfer to external payee).

constraints.additionalInfo: Preferred minimum amount $20,000. For lesser amounts our Business Visa credit card may be a suitable.

features.additionalValue: Overdraft limit is available on an ongoing basis

features.additionalInfo: Interest is charged only on the funds you use

features.additionalValue: Internet, Mobile and Phone banking available

bundles.name: Business Cheque account
bundles.description: This low-cost transaction account is designed with small to medium businesses needs in mind and handles your day-to day transactions efficiently.
